name: BLACKJACK WITH GUNS, DICE AND EVIL DICE I GUESS
name_original: BLACKJACK WITH GUNS, DICE AND EVIL DICE I GUESS
description:
SUBMISSION FOR THE GMTK 2022 GAME JAM

CONTROLS:

-Left Click to shoot

-Left Shift to reload

-1, 2 and 3 to switch weapons.

Credits for all the sound effects / music:
